item.description:
One of our members (Piotr G) has arranged for a "3 Hour Ice Axe and Crampon Workshop" with EMS in North Conway, NH and is looking for other Randomites to join him.

The cost is $45 per person. In order to register for this event you can RSVP here but you also need to contact Piotr - send him an email at pgalecki@yahoo.com or give him a call at 5089041472.

This clinic is great for hikers looking to get out and hike in the winter - especially on steep routes or above treeline. Proper use of an ice axe and crampons is essential for winter travel. This is a very hands-on clinic and takes place outside on the ice and snow. After fitting boots and crampons in the store you will head out and they will show you how to properly use them. A great clinic for any age, fitness and skill level.

No experience necessary.

All equipment is provided - this includes an ice axe, crampons, and plastic double boots.

In order to attend this clinic you need to make reservation and payment to the EMS Climbing School.
Click here for more information about this program from the EMS web site.
item.name: Ice Axe and Crampon Clinic
